Package Game.Entities.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Game.Entities.Commons.Entity
Game.Entities.Player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, GamePublisher, IBehaviour
public class Player extends Entity implements GamePublisher
Class that represents the player entity in the game. Handles health, state, weapons, animation, and collision logic.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Health health, double movingSpeed, double rollCooldown, double rollSpeedMultiplier, double rollTime)
      Constructs a player with the specified health, movement speed, and rolling speed.
      Parameters:
      health - the health manager
      movingSpeed - the movement speed
      rollCooldown - the cooldown between rolls
      rollSpeedMultiplier - the speed multiplier during roll
      rollTime - the duration of the roll
